headline.main: Count Carlo Sforza Looks at Today and Tomorrow; A Revealing Survey of the Forces Which Lie Behind the Rise of the Totalitarians

lead_paragraph: THIS is a small but important book. Count Sforza, was at one time Italy's Foreign Minister. He is an implacable foe of fascism and nazism and all that savors thereof, and he is wise in the ways of underground European politics.
